EmoQ: Oh, Im sorry, I must have grabbed the wrong envelope.
history:
***history***
Monica: (neutral) Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?
Joey: (neutral) Listen uh, Id prefer it if you didnt call me Joey.
Joey: (neutral) Since I dont know anyone here, I thought itd be cool to try out a cool work nickname.
A Waiter: (neutral) Hey, dragon! Heres your tips from Monday and Tuesday.
Joey: (surprise) Theres like-theres like 300 bucks in this one!
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as The Waiter, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {surprise,anger,neutral,joy,sadness,fear,disgust} to respond to the Joey
SourceData: Yeah, people get pretty generous around the holidays. And it never hurts to wear tight trousers.
Coct: Ah, glad you liked the surprise, dragon! I figured you'd appreciate the extra cash.
FSM: Yeah, you got a big party of twelve on Monday night.
